title: Teddy Bear Stool Wool/Deep Red
body: Be ready to be embraced by the great bear paws of this all-time maximum comfort easy chair stool. Its unique design was inspired by Hans J. Wegner Classic Teddy Bear Chair back Circa 1951. The armrests resemble big bear paws ready to embrace you and make you feel loved. It is one of the most renowned designs because of the comfort and style that it can certainly give you.
